70260.「ここは 三門の関所だ。\n この扉から出て コニウェア平原を抜けると\n ココ:
This is Three Way Gate. If you leave through this
door and through Coniware Plain, you'll reach
Cocolata Beach.

70165.「ここは 三門の関所。\n グランゼドーラ王国は この門の向こうですが\n 誰も:
This is Three Way Gate. The Kingdom of Gran Zedora is
beyond this gate, but we have orders not to let
anyone through.

70166.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「くそっ！ どう:
Damn! What's going on? The gates to Gran Zedora have never been closed before!
Normally, they let anyone through. What happened to Gran Zedora? Is my family safe?

75031.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「旅人を通してく:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>The princess of Gran Zedora must be very
cold-hearted if she won't let a traveler
through. What on earth is she up to?

70167.「この門は グランゼドーラ王国の王女\n アンルシアさまの ご命令で 閉ざしてい:
This gate is closed by decree of Gran Zedora Kingdom's Princess, Lady Anlucia.
To prevent any abnormalities from entering Gran Zedora, was the reason for the Princess' agonizing decision.
No matter who one may be, we cannot let them pass.

70168.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……ほう。３匹:
Oh, you want to collect three butterflies?
I don't know what kind of rare butterflies you're looking for, but you're a curious traveler to be collecting insects.
In addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, there is a village called Melsandy, a town called Ceredo, and a country called Arahaghiro.
If you leave here and go east, you will find a resting place on a lake.
You may want to prepare for your journey at that rest stop first, and then explore Lendersia.

75032.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「せっかく苦労し:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>We've worked so hard to get this far, but
we just can't make it to Gran Zedora!
We'll wait here until the gate's passable!

70262.「ここは 三門の関所。\n グランゼドーラ王国は この門の向こうですが\n 誰も:
This is Three Way Gate. The Kingdom of Gran Zedora is beyond this gate, but we have orders not to let anyone through.
Eh, 3 butterflies...? If you want to collect bugs, please do it elsewhere. If you would, clear out.

70263.「この門は グランゼドーラ王国の王女\n アンルシアさまの ご命令で 閉ざしてい:
This gate is closed by decree of Gran Zedora Kingdom's Princess, Lady Anlucia.
To prevent any abnormalities from entering Gran Zedora, was the reason for the Princess' agonizing decision.
...Huh? You brought 3 butterflies, you say? What kind of nonsense are are you talking about? If you have no more business, clear out!

70264.「……なに？ ３匹の蝶があれば\n グランゼドーラへの門が 開かれるだと？\n<:
...What? Three butterflies will open the gate to Gran Zedora?
I've never heard of such a thing, but you should talk to Kristoff over there.

70265.「知らなかったとはいえ 失礼いたしました。\n どうぞ お通りください！:
I apologize, even though I didn't know.
Please, come through!

70266.「あんた グランゼドーラへの門を 通れるのか！\n ……頼む！ グランゼドーラに:
Can you get us through the gates to Gran Zedora?
Please! My family is in Gran Zedora. No, let's not do that. I'll have to see for myself.
I'll find a way to get through the gate somehow.

70267.「あ あなたは……！\n お役目 ご苦労さまです。: It-it's you...! Thank you for your service.

70268.「レンダーシアには グランゼドーラ王国の他に\n メルサンディという村 セレドと:
In addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, there is a village called Melsandy, a town called Ceredo, and a country called Arahaghiro.
If you have business in any of these places, you may leave through this door.

75033.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「あ…あんた 門:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Yo-you got through the gate? Someone like me who's
been waiting here all this time... You crafty sneak!
That's all you are!
